Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Higher Education

Items.Title: Oversight - The Development, Relief, and Education for Alien Minors (DREAM) Act of 2007
Items.ActionText: This Oversight was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Oversight - The Development, Relief, and Education for Alien Minors (DREAM) Act of 2007

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Higher Education

Resolution urging the United States Congress to pass the Development, Relief, and Education for Alien Minors Act of 2009, which would provide a path to citizenship for aspiring immigrant youth who were brought to the United States as young children.
Items.ActionText: This Resolution was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Congress to pass the Development, Relief, and Education for Alien Minors Act of 2009.

Items.Title: Resolution urging the United States Congress to pass the Development, Relief, and Education for Alien Minors Act of 2009, which would provide a path to citizenship for aspiring immigrant youth who were brought to the United States as young children.
